data.title: Morning Pages: Julia Cameron on the Importance of Daily Creative Ritual
data.meta_description: Artist and writer Julia Cameron explains morning pages - the daily creativity ritual she swears by to stay fresh, productive, and inspired.
data.text:
Online Learning

1440 Multiversity Online Learning was created to expand learning resources to the world with community building centered around holistic studies aligned with 1440 cause-based mission objectives.

About 1440

The creation of 1440 Multiversity stemmed from a desire by Joanie and Scott Kriens to establish a beautiful and nurturing destination where people and organizations could gather in community to explore, learn, reflect, connect and reenergize.

More

We are a rich, diverse community of deep loving professionals who respectfully engage and treat one another and others with dignity and love. We will accomplish our mission by energizing and inspiring each other every day.
